item.title: Intel and Commerce Department finalize $7.9 billion CHIPS Act grant
item.description: The struggling chipmaker has cut jobs and pared back expansion plans as it grapples with its worst downturn ever, making the CHIPS Act money a welcome...

item.title: Automaker shares fall as Trump threatens 25% tariff on Mexico and Canada
item.description: Automakers like General Motors and Stellantis have major production presences in Mexico and could take a hit from tariffs.

item.title: Senate report slams airlines for raking in billions in seat fees
item.description: The Senate panel is calling airline executives to testify next week about their carriers' fees.

item.title: Trumpâ€™s tariff threats signal the start of a wild ride in currency markets
item.description: Donald Trump's vow to implement additional tariffs on China, Canada and Mexico signals the start of a wild ride in currency markets, strategists say.

item.title: Constellation Brands' stock falls as Trump tariff plan threatens to make Modelo and Corona more expensive
item.description: Constellation manufactures all of its beers, including Modelo and Corona, in Mexico.
